Package fr.univartois.cril.approximation.util.collections.dynamic

Interface CollectionManagementStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmptyCollectionManagementStrategy, LargeCollectionManagementStrategy, SmallCollectionManagementStrategy
public interface CollectionManagementStrategy
The CollectionManagementStrategy enables to dynamically determine the best strategy to use to manage a collection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CollectionManagementStrategy
    add(Object element)
    Notifies this strategy that an element has been added to the collection.
    boolean
    contains(Object element)
    Checks whether the collection contains the given element.
    CollectionManagementStrategy
    remove(Object element)
    Notifies this strategy that an element has been removed from the collection.

  • Method Details

    • add

      CollectionManagementStrategy add(Object element)
      Notifies this strategy that an element has been added to the collection.
      Parameters:
      element - The added element.
      Returns:
      The management strategy to use after having added the given element.

    • remove

      CollectionManagementStrategy remove(Object element)
      Notifies this strategy that an element has been removed from the collection.
      Parameters:
      element - The removed element.
      Returns:
      The management strategy to use after having removed the given element.

    • contains

      boolean contains(Object element)
      Checks whether the collection contains the given element.
      Parameters:
      element - The element to check.
      Returns:
      If the collection contains the element.
